mapper.select: SELECT place_id AS placeId, place_name AS placeName, place_info AS placeInfo, place_num AS placeNum, place_status AS placeStatus, t.user_name AS belongUser FROM place p INNER JOIN tb_user t ON p.belong_user = t.id where id = #{id}
SELECT place_id, place_name, place_info, place_num, place_status, user_name FROM tb_user, place WHERE id = place.belong_user AND id = 1
SELECT place_id, place_name, place_info, place_num, place_status, user_name FROM tb_user, place WHERE id = place.belong_user AND id = #{id} AND place_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
